Duskruin Title Research (Add your info)

BriarFox
Monday, August 21st, 2017, 7:41:33 AM

Based on my current knowledge and best guesses, here are what each title requires. Help me improve this list with your own info! Thanks so far to Alasatia, Melivn, Allereli, Roblar, Talryssa, etc., and the Hand of the Arkati for their input!

You have access to the following titles from the QUEST-PRENAME group:

Arena Combatant * - 100 entries (141 entries, 91 wins)

Arena Champion * - 500 wins

Arena Hero - 1000 perfect wins

Arena Leader - 500 team wins?

Sewer Scamp - 500 sewer entries? (more than 100 but less than 1260 entries)

You have access to the following titles from the QUEST-POSTNAME group:

Combatant of Duskruin Arena * - 25 entries

Gladiator of Duskruin Arena * - 100 entries (141 entries, 91 wins, 67 perfects)

Hero(ine) of Duskruin Arena * - 250 perfect wins?? (273/266/257 (2 surrenders/4 deaths) / unlocked with 250 wins/250 perfect wins - percentage of wins being perfect wins with min of 250?)

Champion of Duskruin Arena * - 100 wins

Grand Champion of Duskruin Arena - 1000 perfect wins

Flawless Champion of Duskruin Arena - 1000 perfect wins with less than 1 death per 1000 wins?

Heroic Tactician of Duskruin Arena - 500+ wins with 50% or greater perfect wins? (981 wins/931 perfects). Traps dodged?

Bloodriven Brute - 10,000 arena kills

Merciless Executioner of Duskruin Arena - 50,000 arena kills

Companion of Duskruin Arena - 100 team entries

Blood Ally of Duskruin Arena - 250 team entries?

Coward of Duskruin Arena - 100 surrenders

Prey of Duskruin Arena - 25 deaths

Tunnel Sweeper of Bloodriven Village - 100 sewer entries (< 119)

Bloodriven Sewer Runner - 500 or 1000 sewer entries (<1260)

Rat Catcher of Bloodriven Village - 1 rat caught?

Rat Collector - 10 rats caught?

Smuggler of Bloodriven Village - 1 cache found?

Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 7:36:45 AM

@briarfox said in Duskruin Title Research (Add your info):

Based on my current knowledge and best guesses, here are what each title requires. Help me improve this list with your own info! Thanks so far to Alasatia, Melivn, Allereli, Roblar, Talryssa, etc., and the Hand of the Arkati for their input!

You have access to the following titles from the QUEST-PRENAME group:

Arena Combatant * - 100 entries (141 entries, 91 wins)

Arena Champion * - 500 wins

Arena Hero - 1000 wins?

Arena Leader - 500 team wins?

Sewer Scamp - 500 sewer entries? (more than 100 but less than 1260 entries)

You have access to the following titles from the QUEST-POSTNAME group:

Combatant of Duskruin Arena * - 10 entries? (74 entries, 37 wins, 6 perfects)

Gladiator of Duskruin Arena * - 100 entries (141 entries, 91 wins, 67 perfects)

Hero(ine) of Duskruin Arena * - 250 wins/% deaths?? (273/266/257 (2 surrenders/4 deaths))

Champion of Duskruin Arena * - 100 perfect wins

Grand Champion of Duskruin Arena - 1000 perfect wins

Flawless Champion of Duskruin Arena - 1000 perfect wins with less than 1 death per 1000 wins?

Heroic Tactician of Duskruin Arena - 1000 wins with either 500 perfects or 50% or greater perfect wins

Bloodriven Brute - 10,000 arena kills

Merciless Executioner of Duskruin Arena - 50,000 arena kills

Companion of Duskruin Arena - 100 team entries?

Blood Ally of Duskruin Arena - 250 team entries?

Coward of Duskruin Arena - 100 surrenders

Prey of Duskruin Arena - 25 deaths

Tunnel Sweeper of Bloodriven Village - 100 sewer entries (< 119)

Bloodriven Sewer Runner - 500 or 1000 sewer entries (<1260)

Rat Catcher of Bloodriven Village - 10 rats caught?

Rat Collector - 50 rats caught?

Smuggler of Bloodriven Village - 10 caches found?

Updated for all the available info. If you have numbers that prove some of these wrong, please post.

BriarFox
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 9:13:49 PM

Ok, so here are the data points that we have for Champion of Duskruin Arena:

Had it: 129 entries, 3107 kills, 109 wins, 67 perfect wins, 1 surrender, 9 deaths and 165 entries, 4033 kills, 156 wins, 149 perfects, 5 surrenders, 2 deaths Didn't have it: 141 entries, 3169 kills, 91 wins, 67 perfects, 9 surrenders, 19 deaths

This data tells me that it's not based on percentage, or at least it's not based on percentage below 100 wins. I'm thinking it's a minimum of 100 wins with 50 or more perfects, or something similar. @Ordim @jayte I need you guys to tell us when you get Champion of DA.

@goat said in Duskruin Title Research (Add your info):

Fun fact - I can type anything that starts with "duskrui" and still get the duskruin stats.

duskruisdfjk

That's the parser. You can do that with any command that's over 7 letters long.
